summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3953 for the improvement of Shoreland Drive, from Mt. Claire Drive to Lake Park Drive; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48195, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
